title: looking to trade my Sovereign for a cubs sovereign

posts.post_title: looking to trade my Sovereign for a cubs sovereign
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade this SGC 10 Birmingham for one of the following cubs sovereigns:
Moran
Needham
sheckard portrait
reulbach front view

Obviously condition isnt an issue and doesnt need to be graded.
thanks
sean :)
